content: You can play Go using whatever you have, such as poker chips, beads, buttons, coins, etc. You do not need to use Go stones.
translations: ita:Puoi giocare a Go usando qualsiasi cosa tu abbia, come fiches da poker, perline, bottoni, monete, ecc. Non Ã¨ necessario
